feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.39.8
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat: add multi-query transaction support to snowflake piece (#6679) @valentin-mourtialon
  • feat(kallabot-ai): make call and get call details action (#6649) @abdulrahmanmajid
  • feat(jotform): add HIPPA API url for authentication (#6669) @pfernandez98
  • feat(google-sheets): find spreadsheet(s) by name (#6580) @jmgb27
  • fix(beamer): fix create vote action (#6630) @kishanprmr
  • feat(postgres): add query source comment (#6384) @kishanprmr
  • feat(pipedrive): activity, note and find actions (#6546) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: empty externalId should make unable to update project (#6690) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: projects filtering by name wasn't taking effect (#6687) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: sync input field value with search params on page load (#6670) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: sync resolving configure method in embed-sdk with user authentication (#6659) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix: add migration to add READ_RUN permission to viewer role (NEEDS TESTING) (#6626) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: styling for manage pieces button, delete empty spaces (#6684) @hazemadelkhalel
  • chore(deps-dev): bump vite from 5.4.11 to 5.4.14 (#6604) @dependabot

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add abdulrahmanmajid as a contributor for plugin (#6672) @allcontributors
  • docs: add s31w4n as a contributor for doc (#6668) @allcontributors
  • fix: overview text in docs/install/architecture/overview (#6666) @s31w4n

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abdulrahmanmajid, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @jmgb27, @kishanprmr, @pfernandez98, @s31w4n and @valentin-mourtialon

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.39.9
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: add searching filter for projects when creating a release from one (#6699) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: connections page additional filters (#6655) @jmgb27
  • feat: add project home route (#6638) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel and @jmgb27

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.40.0
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(nocodb): add compatibility with self-hosted NocoDB instances (#6618) @loudotdigital
  • feat(wedof-piece): updating wedof actions/trigers piece (#6658) @obenazouz-wedof
  • feat(confluence): improve get-page-content to fetch recursive children (#6702) @geekyme-fsmk
  • fix(google-sheets): fix csv parsing for multiple rows action (#6678) @kishanprmr
  • feat(confluence): new page trigger and custom API call action (#6692) @geekyme-fsmk

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: migrate bullmq repeatable to new api (#6713) @abuaboud
  • fix: increase p limit and remove linear search (#6709) @abuaboud
  • fix: wrong error for missing projectId in api key authn (#6705) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: importing and duplicating flows was breaking routers (#6703) @hazemadelkhalel

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • fix: change publish-piece command to use inquirer (#6682) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add admin controller for 14 day trial key (#6598) @amrabuaza
  • fix: decouple update flow status permission (#6712) @hazemadelkhalel

üìö Documentation

  • fix: change publish-piece command to use inquirer (#6682) @hazemadelkhalel

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @amrabuaza, @geekyme-fsmk, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @loudotdigital and @obenazouz-wedof

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.41.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: added ability for embedding sdk to specify font family used in Activepieces (#6773) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: replace worker threads with child processes (#6730) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • feat(deepseek): Ask Deepseek Action (#6685) @pfernandez98
  • fix(PDF): Correct auto-rotation of images in the PDF (#6734) @kishanprmr
  • feat(amazon-sns): Send Message Action (#6718) @coat

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: sync flow delete with git repo when externalId is null (#6776) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: avoid double user verification using jumpcloud sso (#6777) @abuaboud
  • fix: provision invitation based on sso (#6760) @abuaboud
  • fix: show (Edit Flow) button when user is testing a flow that hasn't been published (#6738) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: improve build-piece command using inquirer and enhance documentation styling (#6733) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: bump pieces that benefit from relative path in custom api call (#6715) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: speed up platform billing queries (#6724) @abuaboud
  • fix: broken jobs in redis (#6723) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: add worker version to workers table (#6578) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: always allow client id/secret override in oauth2 connections (#6778) @abuaboud
  • feat: added button to disable mail server with confirmation beforehand (#6737) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: multiple typo fixes (#6767) @s31w4n
  • feat: add ability to rename flow name by just clicking on it (#6752) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add ArvindEnvoy as a contributor for code (#6775) @allcontributors
  • docs: add coat as a contributor for plugin (#6764) @allcontributors
  • docs: add warning about screenshots with sensitive info (#6750) @hazemadelkhalel
  • docs: handle request priority (#6735) @abuaboud
  • docs: update handbook customer support (#6725) @mintlify

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @coat, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @mintlify, @mintlify[bot], @pfernandez98 and @s31w4n

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.42.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add project role users table (#6788) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • fix: update common and metabase pieces patch versions (#6798) @valentin-mourtialon
  • feat(utility-ai): add PDF and multiple files support (#6353) @kishanprmr
  • feat: add png rendering action to the Metabase piece (#6792) @valentin-mourtialon

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: update flow status when republishing again in project release (#6808) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: payload should be payloads (#6809) @abuaboud
  • fix: speed up submitting payloads (#6799) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: env variables config to workers (#6810) @abuaboud
  • feat: Adding support for syncing specific pieces (#6797) @hazemadelkhalel
  • chore(deps-dev): bump vitest from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1 (#6786) @dependabot
  • feat(google-drive): add teamdrive to get-file-by-id step (#6780) @maarteNNNN
  • feat: introduce private url for sso (#6784) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: introduce people book (#6813) @abuaboud
  • docs: add valentin-mourtialon as a contributor for plugin (#6793) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrabuaza, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @maarteNNNN and @valentin-mourtialon
